question: How was your day?
How do you feel today?
If feeling happy: What triggered your happiness?
answers: Appraisal from boss / Good news / Time in nature / Had good meal / Achieved your goal / Talked with a friend / Watched a movie

question: Are you capable of enjoying things right now?
How often do you engage yourself in the activities that make you feel happy?
Have you experienced a week or longer of lower-than-usual interest in activities that you usually enjoy (e.g. work exercise or hobbies)?
How often do you talk/meet with your family members?
answers: Once in a day / Twice in a day / Everyday / Weekly / Monthly / Occasionally / Rarely

question: How hard do you find it to share your emotions to family/friends?
How often do you meet your close friends?
How bothered have you felt about thoughts that you've let yourself or others down?
How often do you feel no one truly understands you?
How grateful are you today?
Over the last two weeks how bothered have you been by feelings of fear or dread as though something terrible might happen?
Currently are you having thoughts of your own death?
Have you experienced such thoughts before?
What helped you to overcome those emotions?
answers: Therapy / Going for a walk in nature / Watching Movies / Talk or meet-up with family / Meditation / Counselling / Medication

question: Have you seriously consider attempting suicide?
Did you ever plan how you might attempt suicide?
Do you like your job?
How productive do you feel today?
What makes you feel less productive today?
answers: Lack of sleep / Many tasks to finish / Imbalanced Diet

question: What made you feel productive today?
answers: Good sleep / Healthy Meal / Meditation / Excercise

question: How difficult do you find it to share your opinion/ ideas to your colleagues?
How connected do you feel to your colleagues?
Did you enjoy your work today?
How do you find your work?
answers: Easy / Moderate / Difficult / Monotonous / Exciting / Stressful

question: How confident you have been feeling in your capabilities recently?
Have you planned well for the next week?
Are you properly aware of Sleep Hygiene?
Do you take any sleep aids?
What is the room temperature that you have set for night?
How much you know about How Sleep Works?
How fresh do you feel just after you wake up?
Do you do exercise within 1 hour before sleeping?
Do you eat dinner within 2 hours before sleeping?
On what would you generally sleep most?
answers: Soft mattress / Hard mattress / floor / street

question: Do you use pillow while sleeping?
What kind of pillow you use?
Do you sleep alone?
With whom do you sleep?
How old are you?
answers: 0-12 years / 12-18 years / 18-35 years / 35-55 years / 55-70 years / 70-90 years / 90+ years

question: Did you get insufficient sleep?
Do you have any sleep disorder?
Do you face sleep disruptions?
Are you properly aware of the impact of insufficient sleep?
How do you rate your present mental health condition?
How much do you remember your night dreams after wakeup?
answers: A lot / Little bit / Not at all

question: Do you skip breakfast more than once a week?
Do you skip lunch more than once a week?
Do you skip evening meals more than once a week?
Do you skip meals and snack instead on most days?
Do you skip breakfast more than once a week?
Do you skip lunch more than once a week?
Do you skip evening meals more than once a week?
Do you skip meals and snack instead on most days?
Not including plain water were there any other times yesterday when you were drinking any beverages?
Were any of the beverages soft drinks such as cola root beer or ginger ale?
Was the soft drink diet regular or did you have both kinds?
Are you the person who usually does the grocery shopping in your household?
Are you the person who usually prepares the meals in your household?
In the last 7 days did you prepare any meals with meat poultry or seafood?
In the last 7 days did you drink or serve unpasteurized or raw milk?
How many servings of fruits or vegetables do you eat everyday? ( In a typical day averaging workdays and weekends. Select 5 if more than 5)
How many new places do you visit? (Over a period of 12 months. Include new states new cities as well as museum places of interest and parks in your neighborhood.)

How many times do you donate your time or money to good causes? (Over a period of 12 months. Include financial donation your time contribution fundraising volunteering serving your country and the poor ...)

How many recognitions have you received in your life? (Significant public recognitions validating a personal level of expertise and engagement E.g.: diploma degree certificate accreditation award prize published book presentation at major conference medals cups titles...)
How many days of vacation do you typically lose every year? (Unused vacation days lost or carried forward into the following year. Or because of work stress during your vacation.)
With how many people do you interact with during a typical day? (True interactions and dialogues at home at work at the gym ... Average of workdays and weekends)
In a typical week how many times do you have the opportunity to think about yourself? ( Include meditation praying and relaxation activities such as fitness walking in a park or lunch breaks.)

How much stress do you typically experience everyday? (At work or at home due to the environment (noise pollution insecurity...) your co-workers or boss or because of tragic events such as divorce job loss serious illness loss of family or friends... In average over 12 months.)

How many hours do you spend everyday doing what you are passionate about? ( Daily hours spent doing what you are passionate and dreaming about and/or contributing to a greater cause: health education peace society development ...)
How many steps (in thousands) do you typically walk everyday? (Thousand steps daily average over multiple days including work days and week-end.)

How many remarkable achievements are you proud of? (Over the last 12 months personal achievements known to your family close friends or co-workers such as: running a marathon or important race birth successful kids new house or major renovation major success at work opening a new business ...)
For how many years ahead is your life vision very clear for? (For instance illustrated in a vision board detailed in a personal journal or openly discussed with your spouse or close friends.)

In a typical day how many hours do you experience flow? ('Flow' is defined as the mental state in which you are fully immersed in performing an activity. You then experience a feeling of energized focus full involvement and enjoyment in the process of this activity. Watch the youtube video from Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi Flow the secret to happiness)
How often do you shout or sulk at somebody?  In a typical week. Expressing your negative emotions in an active or passive manner.)
How well do you complete your weekly to-do lists? (Include your weekly goals work- and personal-related tasks. On a scale of 0 = not at all to 10 = very well.)
How many people are very close to you? (i.e. close family and friends ready to provide you with a long-term unconditional support.)

How many people do you help achieve a better life? (A reflection of your altruism or selflessness (see the TED video from Matthieu Ricard 'How to let altruism be your guide') e.g.: caring for your family actively supporting a friend mentoring coaching developing or promoting a co-worker ... Over a period of 12 months.)
About how many hours do you typically sleep? (Over the course of a typical working week including week-end)
